interfaces

Interface FatalView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackgroundView, SelectionView, VersusView

    public interface FatalView
    An interface that all views implement. It grants access to identifiers that views can use to refer to other views and requires all views to be capable of starting and stopping their threads.
    Author:
    Marcos Davila

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ERROR
      Identifier for error screen.
      static java.lang.String LOADING
      Identifier for loading screen.
      static java.lang.String SELECT
      Identifier for the character selection menu
      static java.lang.String VERSUS
      Identifier for versus menu.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startThreads()
      Starts all threads of the associated view.
      void stopThreads()
      Stops all threads of the associated view.
